Literature.Author: Huang YB, Wang XF, Wang HY, Liu Y, Chen Y

Literature.Title: Specificity and mechanism of action of alpha-helical membrane-active peptides interacting with model and biological membranes by single-molecule force spectroscopy.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<5% Hemolysis=>500 µM,Mouse fibroblasts 3T3-L1:50% Cell death=>125 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=>83.6µM),Human melanoma A375(IC50=>83.6µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=>83.6µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma SW1116(IC50=>83.6µM),Human rhabdomyosarcoma(IC50=>83.6µM),Human lung carcinoma H1299(IC50=>83.6µM),Mouse skin melanoma B16(IC50=>83.6µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=>83.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=125µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=125µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=125µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=125µM),Human gastric cancer SGC-7901(IC50=>125µM)
